To its right, a simpler building with a red-tiled roof is visible. In the foreground, dark gondolas are moored in the calm water at the foot of the stairs, while small figures of people on the steps and in the vicinity highlight the monumental scale of the main structure under an overcast sky. The camera's slight movement reinforces the environmental focus, capturing the overall splendor and context of the scene.
